about_the_game:
Story synopsis


The Quiet Execution is a short, atmospheric horror game that takes place in a russian isolated village. You, Palach Raskayalsya, served the cult of a demonic entity since you were 19-years-old. You, now 29, were counting the seconds for the end of this 10-year contract that held your soul hostage, even knowing that, after dozens of murders done by your hand, your soul will inevitably face God's judgement regardless. However, the sadistic entity decided to make a proposal that's very hard to resist. In exchange of one more life taken, your soul will be destroyed when your body dies, freeing you from the Judgement of God and, as a consequence, from eternal damnation.



Your mission is simple. Get close enough to your target, lock yourself in an isolated room, surrender your body to give the entity physical form, then simply touch your target. Like all the ones before, their mortal shell will abruptly stops breathing when touched by the demonic entity you puppeteer. A quiet, untraceable death.



The entity, however, seems quite amused with this final stretch of your journey. Could she be hiding her true intentions behind this? After a decade of having your sanity wither away, how far will you go to escape your fate?

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains subtle depictions of violence, blood, and mentions of supernatural topics that might make some people uncomfortable.

name: The Quiet Execution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470/ AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960/ AMD R9 380X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not compatible with VR

short_description: A dark, suspenseful, first-person horror game where you play as the executioner of a demonic cult. When you thought your work was over, the evil entity gave you an irrefusable offer. Possess an ancient evil, become the Quiet Reaper once more. Your freedom lies behind one last life to be sacrificed.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
